page.title: 17THE BEAFORD CENTRE, BEAFORD
page.content: The Dartington Trust bought these premises in 1966, and called it the Beaford Centre. Its purpose is to bring to North Devon artistic events not usually available to the people. The Orchard Theatre was formed here, now based in Barnstaple. The Centre has a Photographic Archive containing 100,000 photos showing Devon old and new. The staff arrange various art events out and around North Devon, is involved in community projects, and runs some evening classes for adults, such as pottery, painting, upholstery and drawing. The Centre is available for residential school parties, who use the environment and Centre facilities for educational purposes. Ten full and part-time staff work in the Centre, with another twelve associated with it based elsewhere in North Devon.
